price: 15. Nous laissâmes (l’Arche) comme Signe à la postérité. Est-il donc quelqu’un pour y réfléchir ?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
